response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's a unique offering that has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I believe it would be a perfect fit for you. Considering its intrinsic worth and market value, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $13,500. This is a significant discount compared to the standard retail price, which reflects our commitment to making high-quality products accessible to discerning buyers like yourself. I look forward to your consideration and hope to have the opportunity to serve you soon.", "product_price": 13500}
